Cohort evaluation

cohort.Rd

Run stochastic individual model across trial cohort individuals in one or more clusters (alternate version incorporating more details of testing and reactive treatment during trial, in progress)

cohort(
  mainpop_data = list(),
  cluster_data = list(),
  n_patients = 1,
  prop_T_c = 0.9,
  age_start = 0.5,
  age_end = 10,
  flag_output = 0,
  test_time_values = c(),
  test_type = "clin",
  flag_pre_clearing = 1,
  censor_period = 0,
  flag_reactive_treatment = 1
)

Arguments

mainpop_data

List output by mainpop() containing main population data
cluster_data

List output by clusters_create() containing cluster data
n_patients

Number of trial cohort patients per cluster
prop_T_c

Treatment probability in cohort
age_start

Minimum age of trial cohort patients
age_end

Maximum age of trial cohort patients
flag_output

Integer indicating whether to show progress of simulation
test_time_values

Time points at which tests are administered
test_type

Type of test administered ("clin" = clinical, "RDT" = rapid diagnostic test)
flag_pre_clearing

Integer indicating whether patients given pre-trial prophylaxis (if 1, place all patients into prophylaxis category at start)
censor_period

Time period after a positive test during which a patient is not counted towards incidence
flag_reactive_treatment

Integer indicating whether patients are automatically given prophylaxis after a positive test (shifting them into treatment category if a clinical case, prophylaxis category otherwise)

Details

Takes a list of parameters, returns a list of raw data (data also saved to files as backup).

Contents
